title: py-pybind11 build fails (lto-wrapper failed)
body:
Below are the steps and the build log. 

```console
$ spack install py-pybind11
<snip>
==> Installing py-pybind11
==> Using cached archive: /home/ynanyam/spack/var/spack/cache/py-pybind11/py-pybind11-2.2.2.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /home/ynanyam/spack/var/spack/stage/py-pybind11-2.2.2-wx6chc2ljq2zdx7t3flanntgwrua56jx/v2.2.2.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/ynanyam/spack/var/spack/stage/py-pybind11-2.2.2-wx6chc2ljq2zdx7t3flanntgwrua56jx
==> No patches needed for py-pybind11
==> Building py-pybind11 [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

4 errors found in build log:
     121    lto1: internal compiler error: in build_abbrev_table, at dwarf2out.c:7478
     122    Please submit a full bug report,
     123    with preprocessed source if appropriate.
     124    See <http://bugzilla.redhat.com/bugzilla> for instructions.
     125    lto-wrapper: /usr/bin/g++ returned 1 exit status
     126    /usr/bin/ld: lto-wrapper failed
  >> 127    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
  >> 128    make[2]: *** [/home/ynanyam/spack/var/spack/stage/py-pybind11-2.2.2-wx6chc2ljq2zdx7t3flanntgwrua56jx/pybind11-2.2.2/tests/pybind11_tests.so] Error 1
     129    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pytest-of-ynanyam/pytest-0/test_keep_exceptions0/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-Vhl7Gd/pybind11-2.2.2/spack-build'
  >> 130    make[1]: *** [tests/CMakeFiles/pybind11_tests.dir/all] Error 2
     131    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pytest-of-ynanyam/pytest-0/test_keep_exceptions0/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-Vhl7Gd/pybind11-2.2.2/spack-build'
  >> 132    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /home/ynanyam/spack/var/spack/stage/py-pybind11-2.2.2-wx6chc2ljq2zdx7t3flanntgwrua56jx/pybind11-2.2.2/spack-build.out
```
I get the same error with gcc 4.8.5. This is on RHEL 7.4. 

```console
$ spack spec py-pybind11
Input spec
--------------------------------
py-pybind11

Concretized
--------------------------------
py-pybind11@2.2.2%gcc@7.2.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
    ^cmake@3.10.2%gcc@7.2.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
        ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@7.2.0 patches=4110a40613b800da2b2888c352b64c75a82809d48341061e4de5861e8b28423f,f84b2708a42777aadcc7f502a261afe10ca5646a51c1ef8b5e60d2070d926b57 ~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
            ^pkgconf@1.4.0%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
        ^openssl@1.0.2n%gcc@7.2.0+systemcerts arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
            ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@7.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
    ^py-pytest@3.0.7%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
        ^py-hypothesis@3.7.0%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
            ^py-enum34@1.1.6%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                ^py-setuptools@39.0.1%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                    ^python@2.7.14%gcc@7.2.0+dbm~optimizations patches=123082ab3483ded78e86d7c809e98a804b3465b4683c96bd79a2fd799f572244 +pic+shared~tk~ucs4 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                        ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@7.2.0+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                        ^gdbm@1.14.1%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                            ^readline@7.0%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
                        ^sqlite@3.22.0%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 
        ^py-py@1.4.33%gcc@7.2.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 

```
